name: Crema alla rosa
desc: A dessert made from fermented milk. Once the milk is fermented and filtered into yogurt, stir sugar in before garnishing with dried roses and chopped nuts. In the beginning, this dish was only popular among adventurers and traveling merchants, but now, it is served as breakfast and a tea-time dessert across Sumeru.

value.text: Restores 20% of Max HP and regenerates 390 HP every 5s for 30s.

customize.name: Ricetta: Crema alla rosa
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Rose Custard.

customize.name: Latte
customize.desc: Latte di mucca dolce e aromatico. Non sprecarne neanche una goccia, neanche quella rimasta sulle tue labbra.

customize.name: Rosa di Sumeru
customize.desc: Bright and beautiful, these pure purple flowers give off a pleasant fragrance that will give any passerby pause. While some like to call this a type of "rambler rose," its relative lack of multiple flowers means that it falls under a different floral classification.

customize.name: Zucchero
customize.desc: A seasoning derived from Sweet Flowers. Has the power to give both energy and happiness.

customize.name: Crema alla rosa deliziosa
customize.desc: A dessert made from fermented milk. When mixed together, the dense curd, fragrant petals, and crisp nuts together create a mellow and sweet taste. As that fragrant milky concoction slips down your throat, it is almost as if you can smell the floral scent from a long time ago.

customize.name: Crema alla rosa sospetta
customize.desc: A dessert made from fermented milk. It appears to be fine, but as soon as you try some... your teeth will quiver due to the unbearable acidity. The lack of seasoning can still be made up for by adding more sugar. However, that lingering sourness is hardly something that can be easily forgotten.

customize.name: Layla
customize.desc: Una studentessa della Rtawahist specializzata in astrologia teorica. Molto predisposta al sonnambulismo e bloccata in una logorante battaglia contro la mancanza di sonno. Il suo più grande problema è riuscire a farsi una bella dormita riposante.

customize.name: Riposo stravagante
customize.desc: La specialità di Layla. Le noci sparse sembrano come stelle che punteggiano il profondo e silenzioso cielo notturno. Basta un morso per rilassare e tranquillizzare il corpo e la mente dopo una giornata di lavoro. Dopo aver detto a Layla come ti sentivi, lei ha esclamato, con un'espressione fra il gioioso e il rammaricato: "O-Ottimo! Ah, se avesse lo stesso effetto anche su di me!"
